Package controller

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddNewAlbumController
    Manages the procedure to add a new album to the user's library.
    AddNewPhotoController
    Manages the procedure to add a new photo to an album.
    AddNewUserController
    The AddNewUserController class adds a new user and goes back to the admin screen.
    AdminController
    The AdminController class controls whether to add a new user or delete one.
    AlbumController
    Manages the album screen and operations to add, edit, delete, display, or enlarge a photo, displays a selected photo's tags, as well as thumbnails and captions of all photos in the album.
    EditAlbumController
    Manages the procedures to edit an album (renaming).
    EditPhotoController
    Manages procedures to edit a photo.
    LoginScreenController
    The LoginScreenControllerClass implements a login screen interface for the user to either sign in as admin or user.
    MovePhotoController
    Manages the procedure to move a photo from one album into a different album.
    SearchController  
    UserController
    The UserController class controls what a user wants to do with their albums and photos.
